name: Lakeridge Golf Course
description: Championship layout in Reno featuring the iconic par-3 island hole over Lake Stanley. Popular for golf groups, tournaments, and corporate outings.

faqs.question: What’s included in Lakeridge golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Lakeridge, carts, and concierge planning. Add transportation, dining, and multi-course options for groups.

faqs.question: How much do Lakeridge group packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $219–$429 per golfer depending on dates, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or large group outings?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tournaments, multi-course itineraries, and transportation for corporate and leisure golf groups.

meta.title: Lakeridge Golf Course | Reno Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Play Lakeridge in Reno with golf groups, tee times, and stay and play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips.
